com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCFormatUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCFormatUtils

  • public class YRCFormatUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to format a string value depending on the data type of the target binding.

      • YRCFormatUtils

        public YRCFormatUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getFormattedValue

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedValue(java.lang.String binding,
                                                 java.lang.String curVal)
        Method to format curVal depending on the data type of the binding. If there is a custom data formatter available for given binding. The value returned will be first formatted based on data type and then based on the custom formatter.For bindings which do not have a custom formatter normal data type formatting will take place.

      • getDeformattedValue

        public static java.lang.String getDeformattedValue(java.lang.String binding,
                                                   java.lang.String curVal)
        Method to deformat curVal depending on the data type of the binding. If there is a custom data formatter available for given binding. The value returned will be first deformatted based on data type and then based on the custom deformatter.For bindings which do not have a custom deformatter normal data type deformatting will take place.

      • isValidDataForType

        public static boolean isValidDataForType(java.lang.String binding,
                                         java.lang.String curVal)
        Utility method to check the validity of the value for a data type.
        Parameters:
        binding - The attribute binding corresponding to the data type.
        curVal - The value to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if the value is a valid value for the data type and false otherwise.

      • getTimeInDaysAndHours

        public static java.lang.String getTimeInDaysAndHours(java.lang.String curVal)
        This method will return the time in days and hours. The input time should be in hours.
        Parameters:
        curVal - time in days
        Returns:
        String time in days and hours

      • getTimeInHoursAndMinutes

        public static java.lang.String getTimeInHoursAndMinutes(java.lang.String curVal)
        This method will return time in hours and minutes. The input time should be in hours.
        Parameters:
        curVal - time in hours
        Returns:
        String time in hours and minutes

        public static java.lang.String getDataTypeErrorMessage(java.lang.String binding)
        This method determines the datatype error message for a given binding
        Parameters:
        binding -
        Returns:
        error message corresponding to the datatype of the binding
